definition: position/location/place/seat/classifier for people (honorific)/classifier for binary bits (e.g. 十六位 16-bit or 2 bytes)/(physics) potential

sentences.english: There are almost 500 booths at this computer convention.
sentences.chinese: 電腦展有超過500家的攤位。

sentences.english: Please ensure that the booth will actually have furniture.
sentences.chinese: 請確保該攤位有必要的傢俱。

sentences.english: Stroll through the merchant’s market, shopping through over fifty booths for treasures and rare finds.
sentences.chinese: 在商市漫步，在五十餘個攤位中淘寶貝和奇貨。

sentences.english: Fascia 300mm(H) standard fascia board with booth number and exhibitor's name in both Chinese and English.
sentences.chinese: 公司招牌參展商中英文名稱及攤位號碼招牌。

sentences.english: The names of the walk-in activities related to the same topic as the workshop.
sentences.chinese: 展覽攤位可與工作坊有相同的活動名稱。

sentences.english: Although this is only small booth, here most of products are exhibited as usual.
sentences.chinese: 儘管這是個小攤位，但是大部分貨物都有被陳列出來。

sentences.english: Buy toilet paper at the stand,please.
sentences.chinese: 請到這個攤位買衛生紙。

sentences.english: The stalls at the Yaroslavsky station.
sentences.chinese: 在雅羅斯拉夫斯基車站的攤位。

sentences.english: An impromptu cricket fight in one of the stalls.
sentences.chinese: 一個攤位上正在進行的一場即興蟋蟀大戰。

sentences.english: Food shopping stalls in Sukharevka the beginning of the previous century.
sentences.chinese: 在蘇哈列夫卡食品購物攤位，在上個世紀初。

sentences.english: Another stall which JAF always patronise at the same hawker centre is this Char Kway Teow stall.
sentences.chinese: 另外一個找食趣常光顧的攤位就是這檔炒粿條了。

sentences.english: Is the stand or cart clean and well-maintained?
sentences.chinese: 攤位或推車是否保持整潔？

sentences.english: Now moved to Restaurant Sheng Long's stall.
sentences.chinese: 現在搬遷至升隆茶室的攤位裏。

sentences.english: The hunter snorted irritably and put his horse into the stall.
sentences.chinese: 獵人打鼾了急燥並且放他的馬入攤位。

sentences.english: Her stand was located about 15 metres away from a stand where live chickens were sold.
sentences.chinese: 她的攤位離出售活雞的攤位約15米。

sentences.english: Her stand was located about 15 metres away from a stand where live chickens were sold.
sentences.chinese: 她的攤位離出售活雞的攤位約15米。

definition: meeting place/place where people gather/CL:個|个[ge4]
the scene (of a crime, accident etc)/(on) the spot/(at) the site

conferences and exhibitions, abbr. of 會議展覽|会议展览[hui4 yi4 zhan3 lan3]
site developed for a group of related enterprises/(industrial or technology) park
shopping mall/shopping center/department store/emporium/CL:家[jia1]/the business world
